inn1.comm: Tharanga starts with a play  and miss outside off-stump
Tharanga is off the mark with a streaky drive down to third man
Big appeal from Asif as the ball swings back into Jayasuriya's pad -- just pitched outside leg
Ball slides down the leg side
Jayasuriya pushed defensively into the offside
Tharanga shoulders arms to his first ball
Again, Tharanga leaves it alone. Lucky to not be called wide by umpire Mark Benson
Good ball from Sami,  swings in and Tharanga flicks, gets on the pads but was going well down, not even an appeal
left alone outside off stump
Tharanga flicks off his pads down to long leg
inside edge and goes to Akmal but doesnt carry, fumble and an easy single taken
good length ball outside off stump, left alone
wide down the legside
Great delivery from Asif! swings in from just outside off stump, Jayasuriya beaten all ends up and ball strikes the pads, caught plumb in front and ball would have crashed the stumps
swinging away outside off stump, Kapugedera plays and misses
defends on the off side and takes a quick single
left alone outside off stump
glided down to third man and a good over from Asif comes to an end
good length ball outside off stump, batsman goes for the drive and gets beaten
full ball, on off stump, drives and edges it to third man for a single
batsman tries to leave the ball but ball hits the bat and runs down to thirdman
driven to mid-off and a quick single taken
turned away to mid-wicket
play and a miss outside off stump
inside edge onto the pads, ball rolls away to cover and a quick single taken
defended on the back-foot down the wicket
full length ball on the middle and leg stump line, inside edge onto the pads, quick single taken
turned away to mid-wicket
left alone outside off stump
one more inside edge onto the pads
pushed on the up back to the bowler
Brilliant shot. Thrashed through cover point. Hit on the up.
Guides with an open-face down to third man
Plays and misses. Asif gives him some coaching advice.
Plays defensively. No coaching advice from Asif this time.
Forced off the back foot and was well-timed. But hit straight to point.
Tries to drive but does not time well.
driven straight to cover
Throws the kitch sink at it and the ball flies high over the slips down to third man.
left alone outside off stump
Suprised by some extra bounce but gets a single behind square on the legside
single down to third man
and another single down to third man -- too much width from Sami
Nearly bowled by a yorker. Squeezes the ball down to fine leg. Just past leg stump.
Defensive push into off-side
Attempted pull but bottom edge and no run.
Defensive push and quick single. Ball bounces back close to his off-stump.
Another play and miss against Asif. he is bowling well on his return to the team.
Tried to cut but can't beat backward point
pushed down to mid-off
Good straight delivery. Kapugedera is looking frustrated.
Tries to drive on the up but no run
Brillaint cut shot. Eased past the fielder at cover point and the ball races away to the fence. That ease the pressure
Fuller length. Plays cautiously.
Edge past Afridi at slip. Ball travelled fast to the left of Afridi at a wide first slip. He did not pick it up.
good length ball on the off stump, pushed to cover

good length ball on the middle and leg stump line, turned away behind square, Tharanga comes back for the 2nd run, excellent fielding from Butt and a good accurate throw, Tharanga short of the crease and 2nd wicket for Pakistan
left alone outside off stump
length ball on the off stump, pushed away to cover, not much of footwork from Jayawardene
length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene lets it go
turned away behind square
full in length on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-off fence
one more half-volley outside off stump, crisply driven through covers
pushed into covers
pushed away from the backward point fielder and a single taken
turned away to square leg
good length ball, pushed on the front-foot to cover
full ball angled into the pads, driven wide of the mid-on fielder and a couple of runs taken
pushed into covers
short ball outside off stump, cut away wide of the thirdman fielder, Gul stops the ball but they complete two runs
pushed into covers
full length ball outside off stump, driven superbly on the front-foot through covers
left alone outside off stump
short and given width outside off stump, Kapugedera goes for the cut shot and gets the edge, ball runs down to thirdman
good length ball on the off stump, defended away to covers
full ball on the off stump, driven back to cover
Plays defensively on the back foot
Flicks off the pads. Asif giving Mahela the stare.
Solid forward defensive. Mahela looking in good touch today.
Good diving stop at point saves a run.
punched away on the back-foot to cover
on the middle and leg stump line, turned away to mid-wicket
Tries to play to leg but misses and hits his pads
Leg bye onto the leg side
Slower ball from Gul, Kapugedera tries to loft straight but gets a big inside edge onto his stumps. Clever change of pace from Gul and that does the trick
turned away uppishly and just short of Afridi at mid-wicket
turned away to square leg
pushed on the up to mid-on
good length ball outside off stump, play and a miss
fuller length ball outside off stump, batsman drives and gets the thick outside edge to thirdman
good length ball on the off stump, pushed to cover
defended on the back-foot to cover
short of length and into the leg stump, turned away through mid-wicket
good length ball on the off stump, pushed into covers
fuller length ball on the off stump, driven down to mid-off and a single taken
outside off stump, left alone
one more outside off stump and Silva lets it go
short ball on the off stump, batsman gets right in line and covers, defends it down the wicket
pitched up outside off stump, Silva goes for the drive and gets beaten
Silva suceeds this time, gets right on top and plays an excellent drive
Sami responds with a bouncer, batsman ducks underneath
One more! fuller length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene goes for a big drive and gets a thick outside edge, simple catch taken by Akmal
good first ball on the off stump, not much of footwork and pushed into covers
short of length ball around the off stump, pushed to covers
right on money, length ball on the off stump, pushed to covers once again, this is good bowling from Gul
short ball banged in on the stumps, Dilshan goes for an ambitious pull shot and gets the top edge, ball flies over fine leg fence
good ball to end the over, pushed to cover
short of length ball on the off stump, defended with straight bat
full length ball on the off stump, driven to cover and a good diving stop by Malik
pushed into covers and a quick single taken
turned away off his legs to mid-wicket
good length ball on the off stump, pushed on the front-foot to cover
one more good ball on the off stump, pushed away to mid-off
length ball on the off stump, Silva moves forward and guides to gully
pushed into cover point and goes for a quick single, poor backing and that costs four runs
pushed to mid-off and one more quick run taken
good length ball on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
left alone outside off stump
fuller length ball on the off stump, Dilshan drives through covers
short in length outside off stump, left alone
good length ball on the off stump, pushed away to point
pitched up on the middle stump, coming in a bit, Dilshan plays right across the line and gets stuck on the pads, appeal but declined
on the leg stump, flicked away to fine leg
turned away straight to short mid-wicket
short of length ball on the stumps, punched hard straight to mid-on
length ball on the middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on and scampers through a single
short ball outside off stump, ball keeps a bit low, Silva goes for the cut shot and gets the bottom edge, bad bounce in front of Akmal and goes through his legs
short of length ball outside off stump, pushed away to offside
short ball outside off stump, Silva goes for the cut shot and gets beaten
down the legside, Silva misses the oppurtunity to score
tossed up on the off stump, pushed away to cover
on the leg stump, swept away to fine leg
short ball on the stumps, Silva rocks back and pulls it away to deep square leg fence
tossed up and full in length but driven straight to cover
defended on the front-foot to offside
wrong one outside off stump, goes back and cuts it to short thirdman
full ball on the off stump, pushed straight to mid-off
bowled from wide of the crease, coming in sharply, inside edge onto the pads and goes to legside
guided to thirdman for a single
Five down! length ball on the middle and leg stump, Dilshan tries to flick off his legs and gets a leading edge to mid-on, Gul takes a simple catch
fullish ball angling into the pads, Silva tries to flick it through square leg but misses
good length ball pitching on off stump and going straight through, Jayawardene gets behind the line on the front foot and blocks
defended on the front foot towards point
too straight from Razzaq, Jayawardene uses the line ,angling into him to flick it to micwicket for one
defended on the front foot towards cover
short of a length ball on middle and leg, Silva movs on to the front foot and taps it towards the leg side for a sharp single
fuller ball on off and middle, defended to mid-on
full ball on off and middle, Silva tries to sweep to deep square leg and marely manages to make contact, risky shot
Afridi drops a fraction short and Jayawardene cuts, poor fielding from the fielder at point who let it go straight through to the fence
defended on the leg side
bowled quick through the air on off stump, defended towards cover
clever shot, Silva just used Afridi's pace to chop down on it and run it fine to the third man fence
defended on the front foot
excellent cut shot, outstanding placement, Razzaq bowled it far too short outside off stump, Jayawardene waited on it and played a fierce cut shot that was placed wide of the fielder at third man
good line and length outside off stump, Akmal collects it behind the wicket
the line and length is excellent again from Razzaq but he's overstepped this time
good length ball on off stump, Jayawardene moves on to the back foot and blocks
where did that come from? Razzaq gets one to bounce sharply outside the off stump, Jayawardene thinks about pulling it but aborts at the last moment
flat ball on off stump, Silva blocks on the front foot
too full from Afridi, Silva gets his front foot forward, rolls his wrists and slog sweeps to the deep square leg fence
defended to cover on the front foot
full ball on off stump, Silva pushes through the covers for a single
Jayawardene taps it past the bowler for a single to long on
played to short fine leg off the back foot
Razzaq is keping it around the off stump and on a decent length, Jayawardene covers the line and defends comfortably
once more Jayawardene movs on to the back foot and defends back to the bowler
Razzaq bowls it a little straighter this time, Jayawardene moves across and works it to midwicket
width offered by Razzaq and Jayawardene uses it to run it down to third man
dabbed wth soft hands in front of midwicket for a single
good length ball outside the off stump, Jayawardene tries to cut but gets a thick outside edge down to third man
tossed up on off stump, that was much slower from Afridi, Jayawardene moves on to the front foot and blocks
driven to long on for a single
Silva slog sweeps Afridi once again to deep backward square leg
not that short outside the off stump but Jayawardene tried to cut it away behind point, the edge lobs up but falls short of Sami at short third man
Afridi ends the over with an offspinner that beats Jayawardene comprehensively
good length outside the off stump, Silva drives through covers for a single
Jayawardene tries to cut Asif but the length isn't short enough nor is it wide enough, he gets beaten and Akmal collects behind the stumps
nagging length on the off stump, Jayawardene pushes to Imran Nazir and sets off for a single
that's the bouncer and Silva ducks under it
a fraction short from Asif and Silva plants his front foot forward and drives through cover point for two

Imran Nazir hits the stumps direct from pont and Jayawardene has to go, outstanding fielding. Silva dropped the ball with soft hands towards point and set off for the single, Nazir sprinted towards the ball, picked up cleanly and hit the base of the stumps with Jayawardene well short of his crease
played to the man on the cover fence for a single
Afridi tosses it up on off and middle stump, the batsman defends on the front foot back to the bowler
tight line and length from Afridi on off stump, Maharoof defends on the off side
too short from Afridi, Maharoof goes on the back foot and cuts to sweeper for a single
pitches on off stump and holds it's line, Maharoof defends back to the bowler
impeccable line and length on off stump, Maharoof defends back to Asif
elegant drive, Maharoof moves on to the front foot and plays the off drive between extra cover and mid off, he's timed that well enough to reach the fence
pushed between point and cover for a single
Asif comes closer to the stumps and strays a fraction on to middle and leg stump, Silva moves across and tries to run it to third man but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye
Asif finishes an excellent spell with a slower delivery that Maharoof defends to mid on
floated through on off and middle stump, Silva waits for it and defends on the off side
played through covers for a single
Maharoof tries to play the big drive on the off side but gets an inside edge on to leg
Silva tries to play it on the leg side but gets hit on the pad, Akmal collects the ball after it balloons up off the pad
quicker ball outside the off stump, Silva tries to cut and gets beaten
defended on the front foot back to Afridi
full length ball on off stump, driven to mid-off on the front foot
short of a length outside the off stump, Maharoof opens the face to play it to point where Imran Nazir does the fielding

superb timing from Maharoof, he saw the ball was on a good length and so he moved back in his crease and punched it off the back footand once it passed Yousuf at mid off it was always going to be four
Maharoof tries an abmitious cut shot this time and gets beaten
Razzaq strays on to the pads and Maharoof works him down to fine leg for one
driven to mid on off the front foot
short of a length outside off stump, cut to the man on the cover fence for a single
swept to deep square leg for a single
Silva tries to back away towards leg stump to try and make room for the cut but Afridi followed him and Silva could only manage to defend back to the bowler
pushed through cover point for a single
Afridi strays on to leg and Maharoof whips it off his pads for a single
defended on the front foot to cover
short of  a length on middle stump, Maharoof dabs it to cover for a single but a poor throw at the non-strikers end allows the overthrow
punched on the up through covers for two more
Razzaq oversteps once again, Pakistan can't afford to give away too many freebies
fuller length on middle and leg stump, Maharoof plays it off his pads to midwicket
short of  a length outside off stump, Maharoof stands tall on the back foot and plays it wide of pont for a single
played with soft hands in front of point for one more to end the over
tossed up on off and middle stump, Silva moves his front foot across and slams the slog sweep into the gap at square leg, powerful shot for four
Silva dabs it delicately to short third man for a single
Maharoof stands his ground and uses his muscle to drive to long off
defended on the off side on the front foot
Silva plays the ball to midwicket, Maharoof sets off for the run, Silva sends him back, the Yousuf at midwicket picks up but his throw dosn't hit the stumps of Maharoof would have had to go
pitches outside the off stump and shapes away from Maharoof who drives inside the line and gets beaten
that one kept a touch low and Maharoof plays it through midwicket for a single

another run out! Silva dabs it towards the leg side and calls for a risky single, Maharoof responds, Razzaq moves across in a flash, picks up, turns around and hits the stumps with Silva just short of his crease
good length ball outside the off stump, Maharoof drives on the back foot to Malik at cover
Maharoof gets beaten by a slower one outside the off stump and he gets an edge that runs wide of the wicketkeeper for four
driven wide of long on for two runs to end the over
defended on the off side on the front foot
played with an open face to short third man
driven through point for a single
pushed down the ground on the front foot for one more
defended on the front foot to the leg side
Bandara pushes forward and tries to defend but plays down the wrong line and gets hit on the pad
statement of intent from Maharoof! He charges Razzaq and lofts him straight back over his head for four
Razzaq bowls it a fraction short and Maharoof runs it fine - perhaps finer than he intended - to the third man fence, Razzaq is under pressure now, the first two balls have gone for four
pushed into the cover region for one
tight line and length, angling into middle stump, Bandara covers the line and defends confidently on the front foot
Razzaq strays on to leg and Bandara plays it behind square for a single
Maharoof backs away to make room and drives it through cover point to retain strike
fullish ball on middle stump, Maharoof backs away towards leg and defends back to the bowler
Maharoof moves towards leg once again and Sami follows him, Maharoof uses the angle to whip it off his hips down to fine leg
Sami fires it into off and middle stump, Bandara plays it through midwicket for one
there's no one in the circle on the leg side so the top-edged pull falls safe, Maharoof was in no position at all to play that shot, the ball hurried on to him and he top-edged it into safe territory
short of a length drifting on to the pads, Bandara tries to work it through square leg but misses
driven on the front foot through covers for one
he starts off with a short ball outside off stump, Bandara swerves out of the way
fullr length this time on off stump, Bandara chops down at it and plays it to point
Gul aims for the blockhole on off stump, Bandara digs it out on the off side
Gul digs in another bouncer but it's misdirected down leg side, wide called
tight line on off stump, Bandara defends on the front foot to mid off
Gul aims for the yorker but bowls a low full toss, Bandara thumps it down the ground to long on for two runs

that was quick and straight from Gul, 135kmh, Bandara plonks his front foot down the pitch and tries to smash it over the off side, he gets an inside edge and the ball crashes into off and middle stump
pitching on off and middle and angling into leg, Maharoof tries to play it on the leg side but gets hit on the thigh
slower ball on off stump, Maharoof drives on the back foot through cover for a single
Sami strays on to leg stump, that may be because Malinga was showing signs of scurrying towards leg himself, he plays it off his pads down to fine leg
Sami bowls it down leg side again, the umpire exercises his arms and calls it wide
Maharoof moves towards the leg side this time and flat bats it down to long on
full ball angling into the pads, Malinga tries to play the flick but gets hit on the pad outside leg stump
Malinga tries to pull the ball but it's too quick for him to time it well, the ball lobs up and falls safe in the vacant square leg region
short of a length ball outside off stump, Malinga hangs his bat out and the ball beats the edge
once again Gul hits the channel outside off stump, Malinga doesn't move his feet but pokes at it and manages to get the ball away through point
too short from Gul and Maharoof gives himself room and pulls powerfully in front of midwicket for four
the slower delivery foxes Maharoof and he has to adjust his attacking stroke into a defensive one
another slower ball and Gul hits the blockhole, Maharoof digs it out back that the bowler and he takes a single after the ball ricochets off the stumps at the other end
137 kmh, the ball hits the perfect length outside the off stump and Malinga gets beaten once again
Sami tries to find the blockhole, Maharoof backs away and drives to cover to bring up his fifty, well played Farveez!
another yorker and this one bursts through the defences of Malinga, who stood rooted to his crease, and uproots leg stump, Sri Lanka are nine down
Sami tests him with a slower ball and Amerasinghe manages to keep it out
Amerasinghe's gets his first run in on-day cricket with a dab on the leg side, well done says Maharoof
length ball from Sami, Maharoof gets his front foot out of the way and blasts it over  wide long on for four more, superb placement
Maharoof retains strike by using Sami's pace to steer the ball down to third man
Gul bowls a clevr slower ball and Maharoof tries to smash it over midwicket but was through the shot before the ball even came to him
huge six, full ball on off stump, Maharoof hits through the line, he merely chipped that really, no real follow through of the bat but the ball soared over the fence at long off
beaten outside the off stump
Gul bowls a short slower ball this time and Maharoof played the pull early and was beaten
too full from Gul and Maharoof smashes it straight back over his head for a one-bounce four, you cannot bowl length deliveries during the slog and not expect to get hit
another slower ball but Maharoof spots it and times the pull superbly for another four to deep backward square leg, Maharoof has played an outstanding innings

inn2.comm: Mahraoof starts off with a no ball, Butt lets it go outside the off stump
good length ball on off stump, Maharoof is angling it across the left hander from over the wicket, Butt chops down on it and plays it to cover
Maharoof strays on to the hips and Butt moves across his stumps and works it down to fine leg
good length ball on off and middle stump, Nazir gets behind the line and defends on the front foot
strays once again on to the hips, Nazir whips it off hips his down to fine leg for four, he's off the mark
defended on the front foot towards cover
a touch too short outside the off stump and Nazir drives behind point on the back foot, Malinga should have cut that off at third man but a poor effort concedes a boundary
quick and stright on middle and leg stump, Butt tries to flick but gets hit on the pad, half hearted appeal from the wicketkeeper but that was missing leg
just 134 kmh at the moment, that one kept a little low on off and middle stump, Butt defends to midwicket
too straight and Butt whips it off his pads down to fine leg
136 kmh this time, full and straight on middle stump and Nazir defends tentatively back to the bowler
that bounced sharply outside the off stump, Nazir tried to drive off the back foot through the off side but got beaten by the bounce
short of a length on off stump, punched back to the bowler on the back foot
good length ball on off stump, Butt moves across and defends back to the bowler
short of a length on off and middle stump, Butt tries to play it off his hips but gets hit on the thigh
Maharoof strays towards leg and Butt flicks it through midwicket for a single
excellent ball, pitched on a good length outside off stump, moved it and then shaped away from the right hander, Nazir fended at it on the front foot and was beaten
Nazir responds by standing his ground and driving powerfully through mid-off for four, that wasn't a bad ball from Maharoof
Nazir tries to repeat the stroke but gets beaten this time
short of a length on off stump, Butt waits on the back foot and plays the ball back to Malinga
a touch wide outside the off stump and Butt drives to point on the back foot
tighter line, on a good length on off stump, Butt defends on the back foot once again
Dilshan saves four! Butt punched that elegantly off the back foot but Dilshan swooped to his left at point and pulled off a superb save
defended to cover on the back foot
short of a length ball pitches on leg stump, Butt flicks it off his pads to midwicket for one
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
good length ball on middle and off stump, Butt tries to pull but mis-hits it to mid-on
he's bowling at around 134kmh, Butt defends a good length ball back to Amerasinghe
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Butt leans forward and drives back to the bowler
Amerasinghe drops a bit short and on leg side, Butt flicks off his pads but straight  to square leg, five dot balls, can he get a maiden?
no he doesn't for Butt pounces on an over pitched ball outside the off stump and plays the cover drive perfectly to the boundary
Nazir drives through midwicket for two more, short ball and he had plenty of time to play the shot
good length ball on off at 136kmh, Malnga's not up to full speed as yet, defended back to the bowler
Malinga fires it down leg side, wide called
too straight and too full, Nazir flicks and helps himself to a single at midwicket
good length, pitching on middle and angling towards off, Butt moves forward and defends
defended solidly on the front foot back to the bowler
defended on the back foot to that man at short point
belligerence from Nazir, Amerasinghe bowls that a fraction short and Nazir latches on to it in a flash, he rocks back and powers the square drive through cover point
defended to point on the front foot
much better line and length, homing in on off and middle stump, Nazir moves across and defends back to the bowler
Nazir finds the gap at point once more, he leans forward this time, opens the face and dispatches a good length ball from Amerasinghe to the boundary
driven in front of point this time for a single
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
loose delivery from Malinga, short and wide, Nazir drives with ease through covers for four more, he's motoring along
Nazir tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
Malinga bowls it much fuller to Butt who stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Malinga strays on to the pads and Butt moves back in his crease and flicks through midwicket with ease
short ball from Malinga, a no ball, and what a shot, Nazir pounces on it, gets on top of the ball and pulls into the stands at square leg
good length ball on off stump, Nazir gets behind the line and defends back to Malinga
Malinga tries to bowl the slower ball but it ends up as a leg side full toss that Nazir flicks past the man at short fine leg, Silva dives on the fence to save the boundary
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
it seems rather tame when Butt is on strike but he's doing a good job of holding up one end, defended towards cover on the front foot
Butt tries to drive through the off side but gets and inside edge on to pad
straightr ball from Amerasinghe, on middle and leg stump, Butt moves across and plays it to midwicket
good length ball that shapes away from Butt who leans forward and chases the ball with a drive, he hardly moved his front foot and was beaten
flicked off his pads to midwicket, Amerasinghe completes his first maiden over in ODIs

Afridi, the bye-runner, runs out Nazir! Nazir drives on the up through cover, he didn't time that well enough and Jayasuriya pulled it in just inside the fence, Afridi set off for the third run but Jayasuriya's flat throw to Malinga found him terribly short of his ground, poor runnng for there was never a third in it
he gets beaten by a fierce delivery from Malinga outside the off stump.
defended on the front foot towards point
played off the pads to square leg
a fraction short and Butt gets on to the back foot quickly and pulls wide of the man at mid-on for four
fuller ball on off stump, Butt leans forward and defends on the off side
too full from Amerasinghe on off and middle stump, Hameed walks across his stumps and flicks to midwicket
pitches outside the off stump and moves further away from the right-hander, left alone by Hameed
once again Hameed chooses to let one go outside the off stump
defended on the back foot back to Amerasinghe
good length ball pitching outside off stump and angling into the right hander, Hameed waits on the back foot and defends to the leg side
good length ball outside the off stump, Hameed punches on the back foot towards cover
he slants it down leg side and Butt gets a tickle on it and the ball speeds past Jayawardene and runs down to the fine leg fence
worked with the angle through midwicket for one more
better line to the right hander, in the channel outside off stump, Hameed pushes forward and blocks
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
full ball slantng into the pads, Hameed shapes to play the flick but misses, the ball hits the pads but Maharoof stifles his appeal for it was missing leg stump
driven off the pads to mid on
defended towards cover on the front foot, Amerasinghe continues to impress with his line and length
flicked off the front foot to wide mid onfor a single, Jayasuriya does the fielding
defended on the front foot towards mid on

what's going on out there, Hameed drove it straight back at Amerasinghe who got a hand to it before the ball hit the stumps at the non-striker's end, Butt scrambled to get back into his crease and the third umpire was called for, replays showed him to be just safe but the third umpire ruled him out before changing his decision and ruling him not out, he must have pressed the wrong button
played down to third man for one
strays down leg side, wide called
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

full ball on the pads, Hameed clips it off his pads and the ball races to the square leg fence, Amerasinghe tries to prevent the boundary with some fancy footwork but fails to do so, his foot was on the line when the ball hit it
defended solidly on the front foot towards cover point
short of a length outside off stump, steered down to third man for a single
good length ball angling into the left hander from round the wicket, blocked back to the bowler
Maharoof slips on to the pad and Butt flicks him neatly through square leg
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
tight line and length on off stump, Butt defends back to Amerasinghe on the front foot
fuller ball from Amerasinghe outside the off stump, Butt drives on the up to mid off
short of a length ball angling across the left hander, Butt waits for it and dabs it down to third man for one
full ball on the pads, Hameed moves across and flicks it hard and in the air down to fine leg, the ball reaches Maharoof on the bounce
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
too full and the line is poor as well, Butt flicks it off his pads through midwicket for two more to end the over
defended to short third man
full ball on off and middle stump, Hameed reaches for it and plays  it to midwicket
no turn on offer for Dilshan, Hameed leans forward and drives to long on for one
Dilshan chances the line of attack from round the wicket and Butt pushes it towards cover
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
driven down the ground to long on for one, Dilshan finishes a tight first over
pushed to long on for a single
not much spin first up, Hameed defends towards the off side on the front foot
worked off the pads to fine leg for a single
tossed up outside the off stump, Butt reaches out for it and tries to steer it past short third man but finds the fielder
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
pushed through covers on the front foot
Pushed down to long-on for an easy single. Too short that time and Butt has all the time to rock back and pat it down
clipped away cutely from the off side to the midwicket region for another single. It's going easy for Pakistan at this point and Sri Lanka's spinners haven't turned on the heat as yet
flighted from around the wicket, on middle and Butt pushes it to the cover fielder
glided away towards point but good agile fielding at gully
on the front foot and sweetly timed through extra cover, he really makes that shot look elegant, like a yong Saeed Anwar almost. It allows the batsmen to complete a couple
fired into middle and off, defended watchfully to the off side
flighted by Bandara, defended carefully to the off side
turn and bounce there, Hameed goes on the back foot and attempts to pull but is surprised by the extra zip, can't get any sort of timing on the pull
flighted again but not as much turn this time, defended to the off side
tossed up and Hameed goes for the drive but the inside edge trickles down towards mid-on, bowler cleans up

That's nailed him. Tossed up beautifully by the legspinner, pitches on leg and spins back, Hameed gets his front foot forward and pushes tamely but is struck on the front pad. Loud appeal and though he's well forward, umpire Mark benson lifts the finger straight away. He was no doubt well forward but that ball was going on to strike off. Bandara gets his reward for persisting with flight. Now then, is there a twist in store?
patted to the off side
drops a bit short, Butt quick on his feet, jumps on his back foot and cuts it away for another single
over the wicket and a hint of turn again, Yousuf on the back foot and negotiates it with a tap towards short midwicket
similar ball, similar caution, no run again
this time he finds the gap, off the mark with a pat to long-on for a single
fired in a bit quickly and Butt slaps it past the bowler to long-on for a single. Tap-tap cricket going on here. At some point Sri Lanka will need to get the fielders in
pushed to short midwicket but can't beat the field
flighted on off, defended towards cover, thinks of a single but this isn't the time for risks
clipped to the leg side but again can't beat the field. Tight control by Bandara
on the front foot and negotiating the flight to push to long-off for a regulation single

Now that's reckless. Yousuf pushes to the leg side and thinks of a single, Butt is already halfway down the track and Kapugedera, at point, swoops in and lets rip a fierce throw. It isn't accurate but Bandara manages to snatch it clean and whip off the bails. Butt is just short of his crease and the third umpire flashes the red light.
flighted ball, on the front foot and driven towards mid-on
gently steered to the off side for a single. Two new batsmen at the crease now and is it time for Jayawardene to take the Powerplay?
typical Jayasuriya start, fired into off stump and driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted into middle, tapped carefully to the off side
turn that time, hmm interesting, pitches on leg and turns into middle, Malik tries to flick it but is beaten by the spin
pushed to the covers but can't beat the field
down the ground this time, runs a single to long-off
that's a good way to play Jayasuriya, wait for the ball rather than push at it and steer it to third man for an easy single
Now that was close too, flighted and Yousuf tries to sweep but misses. Big appeal for lbw but that ball pitched outside leg and can't be given
cut away to the sweeper fielder for a brace, Yousuf seems to be getting into his stride
Edgy this time, goes for the sweep and the ball gets the back of the bat and lobs up. Luckily it lands in front of the wicketkeeper, who tries to get to it.
bit of turn again, Yousuf beaten and gets a leading edge back down the ground, luckily that's not too uppish
slightly short, Yousuf goes for the cut but again can't find the timing. The ball is stopping a bit now and Bandara is adjusting well here
defended down the ground, again can't find the middle of the bat
on the back foot and pushed to long-on for a single
fired it and driven to extra cover for another easy run
flighted on off, tries to turn to leg but can't beat the fielder at short midwicket
tight again, pushed back to the bowler
on middle and Malik defends it off the front foot. The last few overs have been quiet. Pressure gradually building here
driven down the ground for a single to long-off
Steered to deep cover for a single. Sri Lanka bottling it up here with their traditional middle-over strangle
tossed up outside off and Yousuf pushes it gently to the off side, not forceful enough to beat the field
wonderful ball this time, tossed up on middle and turning away, Yousuf drives but can only get a thick edge back down the ground

clever, very clever. Bandara tosses it up on leg and tries to spin it around Yousuf's pads but he sweeps the most delicate sweep and gets a boundary to fine-leg. Cute shot that time and it produces the first four in a while
flipper, pitches on middle and hurrying onto the batsman, Yousuf adjusts in the last minute and pushes it to the off side for a single
another attempted flipper, keeps a bit low as well but Malik is upto the task, cutting it for a scampered couple
good start from Maharoof, short of a length and rising a bit, Yousus defends to the off side
short of a length, Yousuf cuts it away from his body towards gully, can't beat the field though
slower ball this time and Yousuf watchfully taps it to the cover region, three dot balls in a row now
slighly fuller and Yousuf drives but can't beat the inner ring, straight to cover

What a jaffa! Maharoof unleashes a special. Is this Abu Dhabi or is this Lord's? Short of a length, pitched on middle, cutting away viciously and rattling off stump. Yousuf drives but misses it all ends up and can only look back in anguish. That was one lethal blow and Pakistan slipping here
Short of a length, turned away towards mid-on but no run.
good line and length straight away, on off and fullish, Malik keeps it out with a forward defensive
full again and driven to the covers, Kapugedera throws himself athletically and stops the ball heading for the boundary, keeps it down to a single
can't stop this one though. Akmal lets rip a cracker, on the front foot and driving crisply through the covers for a gorgeous four. This boy can bat and he's begun in fine fashion
drifting down the leg side, Akmal moves inside the line and tries to flick but that's called a wide anyway
teases with a full length ball outside off, Akmal pokes at it greedily but is beaten. Good testing line that

Smooth, very smooth. Straight and full, Akmal shuffles across and laces a classic on-drive. Bandara chases it all the way to the long-on fence but his feet are in contact with the ball as he stops it. Good effort, even better shot
shuffles across the crease and glides a full ball to third man. Eleven off the over and Akmal is beginning to step it up in style
Maharoof keeps it tight, short of a length, Akmal decides to defend it back to the bowler
similar length, glided to point. Fine return by Maharoof. Another wicket and we really have a tight one here
pegging away, slightly fullish and Akmal doesn't have the room to free his arms, on the front foot and blocks carefully
drives on the front foot but can't get the timing, straight back to the bowler
slower ball but Akmal reads it well, waits and strokes it elegantly through extra cover for a single
probing outside off but over-steps before delivery. Malik decides to let it go, one run to the total anyway
short of a length that time and it rises to a healthy height. Malik on the back foot and keeps it out towards cover
Akmal thwacks that, front foot down the track, over-pitched on leg stump and it gets the treatment it deserves, screaming through the midwicket region for a boundary.
similar delivery and Akmal tucks it away to the same midwicket region for a couple. He's a busy player and is rattling along here
on middle stump this time and Akmal has no option but to defend it down the ground. That was 139 kph, not the pace he's capable of
on the front foot and glided through point for a single
outside off and Malik lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
slower ball this time, Malik tries to scoop it to the leg side but can't get the elevation, ball gets to mid-on on the first bounce
full length, over-steps again, Akmal steers it to point
another screamer through square leg, full ball and he whips it exquisitely off the pads for a crackling four. He's playing a little gem here
glided away square of third man for a single, goes for the fierce cut but can't get he placement
defended off the front foot watchfully
slower ball again just 70.2mph and Malik drives it to mid-on, thinks of the single but decides against the risk
full ball on off, Malik goes for the expansive drive, times it well but can't beat the mid-off fielder. Good ground fielding from Sri Lanka in this innings
slightly short and eased away to the off side for a single
on the front foot and turned away past short fine for another single

Now then, yet another hesitation and Akmal was in trouble. Tipped to the off side and thinks of the single but Dilshan is as alert as a hawk, swooping down and firing the ball back to the keeper. Akmal luckily makes his ground
moves way across the stumps and sweeps it behind square for a single. Akmal looking to improvise always
slightly on the shorter side and jabbed away to cover
quicker ball on middle, Malik waits for it late and angles it towards short third man
pushes it but it's straight back to the bowler

That's such a bizzarre way to get out. Sweeps wonderfully past short fine leg and watches as the ball races away towards the fence, Upul Tharanga dives full length and pulls off a fine save, the batsmen complete two and call for the third but there's a misunderstanding and Malik is standed halfway down, the ball is fired into the wicketkeeper and the simplest of run-outs completed. The umpires check if it's a four or not but Tharanga's save is deemed fine, Malik has to go
swept away for a single. Afridi off the mark
another sweep, another single
again he moves towards the off side and sweeps it behind square for a single
flighted outside off, Afridi manages to keep it down, driving to long-off for a single. It promises to be a cat-and-mouse battle here, Bandara's flight v Afridi's daring
steered away to cover for a single
full ball on middle, Afridi brings out the lap sweep and scampers a quick couple. Afridi playing it sensibly here, no aerial shots yet but all very sensible strokes
shuffles outside off and sweeps but is struck outside off, appeal goes off but you can't give those
on the back foot, reads the flipper well and pats it down the ground to long-off for a single
tossed up outside off but Afridi resists the temptation to slog that, drives it crisply to extra cover
cheeky, very cheeky, fired down leg and Akmal seizes the chance, sweeps it fine, almost past the wicketkeeper for a four. The finest of sweeps and Jayasuriya is frustrated with the line
steered through cover for a single, that's all they need actually - singles
watched carefully and defended down the ground
flighted on leg, Afridi charges, jumping down the ground and smashing it straight. It raps Jayasuriya on the boot before deflecting down the ground
quicker ball, on the back foot and driven through long-on
fantastic back-foot cover-drive from Akmal, slightly short and Akmal rocks back, backs away and lets rip a crackling drive. The fielder on the square fence can't get to it as it's so well timed
driven straight to short extra-cover
watchfully played, on the front foot that time and blocking it cautiously
glided off the back foot to gully
goes for the cut but can't get the timing, only manages an under-edge down the ground
good comeback from Bandara, quicker ball on off and defended to the off side. Five dots in a row after a first-ball four. Good control for a legspinner
Afridi decides to go, twinkling feet and tries to whack it down the ground but the thick edge soars high over extra cover and luckily lands in no-man's land. Maharoof gets to it on the bounce
tossed up on leg stump and swept brutally, it was hit so hard that Lokuarachchi, the substitute fielder, watches it speed between his feet. The ball pinges into the square fence
Down the ground again, he's on the move now, Slightly short and flat-batted over cover for a sizzling four. Nobody can even think of getting to that, it rocketed into the fence
swept away but straight to short fine
down the ground, wide of the long-on fielder and Afridi thinks of two but Akmal is ambling the first run. Poor running there, that was a couple all the way
driven watchfully down the ground back to the bowler
hard back-foot drive to extra cover, can't get past the diving Dilshan, though
That was a bullet, a true, blistering thwack through extra cover. He charges down the ground and pulps it forcefully for yet another four
turned away to the leg side for a single, they think of two but decide against it. No more run-outs, please
patted through the vacant cover region for a single

What does one do? Boom boom all the way. Jumps down the ground, gets to the pitch and pounds it straight, as straight as an arrow, over the bowlers head for another four. Afridi wants an early dinner. Enough is enough, he seems to be saying
. Outside off and that kept a bit low, Afridi cuts and gets the under-edge, wicketkeeper Jayawardene couldn't get his hand to it and grasses a tough chance
Yorker length to start off with, on middle stump, Akmal drives it in a controlled fashion to cover
full length on off, driven straight to the cover fielder. Pakistan in control of the rate now, just around 4.7 an over needed

And that was nearly yet another run-out. Ball kept low, Akmal missed it, so did the keeper and they think of a bye. Afridi is way down the track but Akmal isn't interested. The throw is wide and Malinga can't pull off the run-out. Afridi survives but is furious at Akmal for not reacting
driven back to the bowler, full and straight and Akmal presents the full face of the bat
driven to cover
This is too easy now, Bandara flights it outside off and Afridi jumps down the track yet again, tries to go over cover but the thickish outside edge flies away over point for a four. Boom boom

change of angle matters a little now. It's tossed up and Afridi arrives, even before the ball is delivered, and creams it down the ground for a blistering four. Straight and hard - the best way we guess. Boom boom
Shot of the day must be, a flat-batted six to beat all flat-batted hits. Flatter this time and he charges again, tonks it sensationally through extra-cover for a six. Boom boom boom
And this is bigger, much bigger. Thrash, bang, wallop. Similar formula, down the ground and blasts it way over extra cover for a huge six. That's massive. Thunder bolts flying around now
Miscued and that's six more, he tries to whack it over long-on but the thick edge howitzers over long-off for another six. The fielder can't get to it

What an over. Ends with a flourish, down the ground and plasters it back over the bowler's head for a huge hit. 446666 - the second most expensive over in one-dayers. Only behind Herschelle Gibbs. Blitz, boom, bash, bosh. Bring them on
glided to the off side for a single
slower ball and he picks it up well, driven down the ground
tries to go through the off and is rapped on the pads
slapped through cover, Akmal joins the party this time, finds the gap through mid-off and cover and the ball races away for another four
short and pulled away, good bouncer from Malinga and it induces the top edge, Amarasinghe tries to lunge for it but it bounces just short
short again, Afridi pulls this time and the top edge flies towards fine leg again. Again it's Amarasinghe but he can't get under it and manages to stop it from spinning away for a four
Turned away to deep square leg for a single
slower ball, well disguised, Afridi backs away but is fooled, doesn't miss the stumps by much
short ball, he ducks under it. Good testing ball

dropped, that would have been a sensational catch but he grassed it while falling over. Afridi slaps a short one over cover, can't get the timing and it soars towards extra cover. Amarasingle dives full length, gets his hands around it but fluffs it while his arms hits the ground

Pulped that one, clubbed a full-length ball down the ground and Maharoof does well to get out of the way. That could have injured him. The ball screams away to the straight boundary and almost takes the cameraman along the way. More boom, boom
short arm pull, crisply struck but there's a sweeper there and they're kept down to one
slower ball and Afridi manages to read that one, driven well down the ground
finds the gap through cover and dabs a full ball for a single in that region
Now the umpire needs to take cover. Backs away and sees the short of a length ball, forehand top-spin down the ground that time and it judders down the ground for another four. Boom, boom all the way
down the leg side, Afridi moves across and tries to flick it away past the keeper but he can't get to it. It's too wide
clubbed a full one through extra cover for a single
short one and pulled away to square leg for a single. Crisply done

short ball again, Afridi gives himself room and decides to have some fun with his defence. Stands there, like an emperor in his land, and pats it tamely to gully. A short ball is supposed to intimidate, here is seems to be a lark

What a way to finish. Short ball and Akmal dismisses it with disdain, stands tall and clatters an imperious pull through midwicket for a four. It brings up his fifty and ends the match in style. Akmal and Afridi embrace each other in whoops of delight and are soon mobbed by spectators who invade the ground
